title: Very good customer service
text: There's a lot I can say you do great, but you customer service is the best. Great people working there.

title: Must say your cashier RO store #00648…
text: Must say your cashier RO store #00648 were wonderful,  great customer service,  very organized and detailed oriented with lot of patience and passion for your company and customers. I was very happy with my service from her today I must say you need more like her.

title: Cute mini dresses over cute leggings
text: Cute, cute, cute dresses that are casual and fashionable. I love the great selection of mini dresses that came out this spring. Sometimes I wear the bodycon dresses alone and sometimes I pair them with your incredible selection of leggings...either way people notice. Some of Rainbows clothes are like hitting the jackpot because you're paying  a lot less for a cute dress that you would be paying 4xs the amt at another clothing franchise or boutique.

title: So not sorry
text: Im sorry but I w snapped at rain ows plenty of times and to have the order sent to the wrong address and still had to reorder my items a 2nd time. I had to use a different email address because for some reason my email address was not correct. But the fact that I got no apologies or anything because I had to 3 different times is ridiculous and outrageous.  And I'm still getting different emails from another person saying that my lost items are in the way.. lack of communication is the key word on your part.

title: I love the rainbow shops
text: I love the rainbow shops, whether buying online or in the store. This was an online order. Always packed superb, communication great. Products are definitely worth the look. I've been shopping with them quite awhile.

title: My experiences shopping online
text: My experiences shopping online, is so much better than purchasing in  stores. The customer services are poor, the associates makes it so hard to approach them. Not all Rainbows are that way. Last year, my husband and I, traveled from Wash. DC to Williamsburg, Va for a vacation. We visited the Rainbow location in the outlets there. Customer service was "PERFECT." We was greeted at the door, they were friendly and helpful from the beginning to the end. But when I'm home, I rather shop online than to go in the stores. I usually shop in the Maryland locations (District Heights Md). I will continue to shop online unless I'm desperate and need something quick to wear for the day.  Thank you!

title: Shopping For Daughter
text: My daughter works nights and she wanted me to shop for her up coming vacation trip, my cousin told me about Rainbow and I'm so glad she did. Easy Shopping, bright colors and THE PRICES ARE WONDERFUL. Thank you Rainbow Shops.

title: Love
text: I've always loved Rainbow! I have one right here down the street from my house. The only thing they would need to change is stop trying to sell winter clothes during summer & summer clothes during winter. It's aggravating sometimes because i have to go to other shops to look for what i really want

title: I worked for Rainbow for years in the…
text: I worked for Rainbow for years in the 90s into the 2000s. I have been shopping at Rainbow since I was 16 years old and I am now 52 years old 7 kids later. I will always shop Rainbow because their sizes fit me well abd the prices are great. I can always count on them for my go to especially last minute outfits or revamping my wardrobe. I have 5 girls, agres range from 35 years of age to 17 and they love Rainbow. Rainbow has saved me when it came to school dances, weddings, baby showers, BBQs, High School Reunions ,even when I had to go to a funeral wanting to look my best and a hard time. Thank you ! Sincerely, Diana Bautista

title: It was easy to find the best price for…
text: It was easy to find the best price for what I was looking for. Having the categories available to select which type of clothing I was looking for within the sale category was very helpful.

title: Excellent prices and selection
text: Excellent prices and selection. It also very easy to navigate around the site!!! It's my first time shopping at Rainbow online, but definitely not my last!!!

title: Best Prices, Colors and latest fashion
text: What made my experience great with rainbow is the fact I don't have to pay for shipping.  Also, there are two Rainbow stores on the island, and what is online is not in the stores 90% of the time.  Many times, people ask me where you got that blouse or pants I am wearing, and when I told them Rainbow, they will say oh I was at the store, and I did not see that outfit.  I would then say I got it online.  Also, I love shopping online at Rainbow's because they have all sizes and colors you can think of.  I'm loving it!

title: I like shopping from the online store
text: I like shopping from the online store, much better than the original store don't get me wrong I like the stores as well, I just don't have to wait in line with a bunch of screaming kids and people!👍

title: Fast delivery
text: Fast delivery. Sizes are always correct for me. I love rainbow clothing because it's affordable and so many choices. Love my rainbow. Thank you rainbow.

title: VERY EASY CHECK OUT
text: I JUST TYPED IN WHAT SIZE I WEAR AND WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR IN EVERYTHING POPPED UP NICE CLOTHES AND REASONABLE PRICE THEY HAVE BETTER AND NICER SHOES ON LINE FOR RAINBOW AND HAVE MORE SIZE'S THEN THE STORE INCLUDING BETTER CLOTHES...

title: It was very easy placing my order…
text: It was very easy placing my order online also knowing when I will get my order. It saves time and money on shopping. I will definitely be reordering again.

title: Awesome company
text: I can only say this company is amazing as well awesome.My orders are always correct and on time.The thing I wish they start having things for teenager that are 15 years old and up for girls and boys!!

title: I am a very loyal customer
text: I am a very loyal customer. I really love rainbow. You can catch me constantly commenting that rainbow has affordable clothing , that is stylish and contemporary.  With that being said. I really thought I was going to get disappointed. I had a birthday gift that I brought for someone . The individual did not want it. I had a watermark on my receipt. I had a slight delay in my return. The district manager of your district. Tiffany. She came in and did a fantastic job. It has been said that the more expensive stores are more concerned and interactive with their customers. Your ambassador , district manager Tiffany, got to the bottom of my issue. She represents your company in an excellent way. She was patient, and determined to get to a quick resolution,  to my problem.  Tiffany / rainbow squashed the myth that less expensive stores are not dedicated and loyal to their customers. Rainbow is appreciative , and fully engaged in giving their customers a wonderful shopping experience. Rainbow /Tiffany I am glad to continue to be a loyal customer to rainbow. Good job rainbow/ Tiffany district manager. Ford city mall burbank ill. A very satisfied customer. Yvonne jerdine,

title: I happen to step into a Rainbow store…
text: I happen to step into a Rainbow store many years ago and have been shopping at Rainbow stores ever since then. While cruising on the internet I stumbled upon your online store. I did not know there was an online store. I was skeptical to order online though was not sure if the quality was comparable to the the brick and mortar store. Well, after my first order I was very happy to find out the quality is the same as what are in your stores. I don't recall that your brick and mortar stores advertise the online store. But it is something that should be definitely be done so all your customers are aware. I would recommend placing it directly behind the cash registers since there is normally a giant wall behind the cash registers. The same women who shop at Target, Walmart, Ross, TJ Maxx, Marshall's and Bealls Outlet are also the women that would be shopping at Rainbow. I know, I am one of them.  Good luck on your success.
